title: C4D一开启物理天空就出错
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
C4D一开启物理天空就出错
今天用C4D做了个东西，于是打算加上物理天空，结果刚点开启就出错了，还生成了错误报告，并且软件自动备份了文件


以下是错误报告
CINEMA_4D_Crash_Report_WINDOWS{
        ComputerInfo
        {
                OS_Type = WINDOWS 32 BIT
                OS_Version = Windows XP Professional Service Pack 3 (build 2600)
                Number_of_processors = 4
                Processor_Type = AuthenticAMD, stepping 3, model 5, instruction family 15
                Processor_Name = AMD Athlon(tm) II X4 640 Processor
                Processor_Speed = 3020 MHz
                Processor_Features = FPU, MMX, SSE, SSE2, SSE3, MMX extensions, 3DNow, 3DNow extensions, RDTSCP, CMPXCHG8B, CMOV, VME, DE, PSE, MSR, PAE, MCE, APIC, SysEnterSysExit, SysCallSysRet, MTRR, PGE, MCA, PAT, PSE36, FXSR, 
                Graphics_card = Vendor: ATI Technologies Inc., renderer: ATI Radeon HD 4250 Series, version: 3.2.11554 Compatibility Profile Context (8.782-100930m-106215E)
                Loaded_Plugins = addons alembic allplan ArchiCADExchange bitmapfilter bp2lw bp2max bp2maya bp2xsi browser characteranim cameramapper collada14 collada15 compositing dwg dwgobjects fbx expressiontag graphviewcore modeling motioncam newman objects onlinehelp onlineupdater openexr python relaxuv sculpt shader sla spacemouse updatemerge xtensions advancedrender cineman sky walkthrough dynamics2 iges OkinoComClient hair ca2 clothilde mocca motiongraphics settings.cof sketch thinkingparticles tpoperators CineCAT IvyGrower Thrausi.cob SetPATH vraybridge 
        }
        ApplicationInfo
        {
                CINEMA_4D_Version: 14.034
                CINEMA_4D_BuildID: RC68643
                Memory(Global): 261979134
                Memory(GlobalPeak): 261979134
                Memory(Total): 12553
                Memory(Current): 12414
                Memory(LowMemCnt): 0
                DebugMode: Off

因为太多了我就不全复制了
